mapper.select: SELECT u.name, u.gender, u.birthday, u.nation, u.email, u.phone, u.wechat, u.qq, u.user_id userId, u.self_profile selfProfile, u.personal_signature personalSignature FROM `user` u INNER JOIN user_association ua ON ua.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ua.association_id = #{associationId}
mapper.sql: id, user_id, password, name, gender, birthday, nation, email, phone, wechat, qq, self_like, self_profile, personal_signature, state, can_view, can_del, tree_id, is_del
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, user_id, password, name, gender, birthday, nation, email, phone, wechat, qq, self_like, self_profile, personal_signature, state, can_view, can_del, tree_id, is_del) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfLike,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfProfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalSignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{canView,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{canDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{treeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,
user_id,
password,
name,
gender,
birthday,

email,
phone,
wechat,
qq,
self_like,
self_profile,
personal_signature,

can_view,
can_del,
tree_id,
is_del,

mapper.update:
update user
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{record.gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{record.birthday,jdbcType=DATE},

can_del = #{record.canDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tree_id = #{record.treeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_del = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
